document_data.name: Albrath
document_data.symbol: An open hand with a glowing [[gem]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''House Albrath''' was a mercantile house that hailed from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Their trade involved the bulk dying of linens, laundry services and, for quite a hefty price, the discreet disposal of illicit goods, contraband and even bodies from locales throughout the Bluff.

While they maintained a congenial demeanor on the surface, they were determined and razor-focused in their business dealings and acquisitions, which included a select few foreign assets.
document_data.Members: As of the year [[1370 DR]], the family was led by their patriarch and [[Merchants Council]] representative [[Embro Albrath]].
